                           Release Notes

Comments :
A former professor (Kilmer) concocts a brutal experiment in order to 
get the word out on the effects of global warming. By trapping six 
people in an urban Turkish bathhouse, he vows to overheat his hostages 
unless his global-warming hypothesis is published on the front page of 
his local paper.


Director : Philippe Martinez

 
Writer: Robert Malkani
